entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers or drizzle. High 8 except plus 4 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8 except plus 4 along parts of the coast. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers or drizzle. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers changing to drizzle overnight. Fog becoming fog patches overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Drizzle ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 1.
